>
[Reflecting Shield](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2825)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=721" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 234 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 18,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Shield** [Buckler](/Shields.aspx?ID=17)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This high-grade silver buckler (Hardness 6, HP 24, BT 12) is polished to a mirrorlike sheen. The shield functions as a [spellguard shield](/Equipment.aspx?ID=325) that can also reflect spells. 

**Activate—Reflect Spell** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32)) **Frequency** once per day; **Trigger** You're targetd by a spell; **Requirements** The _reflecting shield is raised_; **Effect** You attempt to reflect the spell on its caster. The shield attempts to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=2250) the spell, with a counteract rank of 9th and a counteract modifier of +30. If the spell is successfully counteracted, it's turned back on its caster. 

**Craft Requirements** The initial raw materials must include at least 2,750 gp of silver.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
